statements: SELECT plot_name, soil_ph FROM soil_health_monitoring;
SELECT * FROM soil_health_monitoring WHERE soil_ph > 6.5;
SELECT plot_id, plot_name, nutrient_levels FROM soil_health_monitoring WHERE plot_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT plot_name FROM soil_health_monitoring WHERE nutrient_levels ->> 'nitrogen' = 'high';
SELECT AVG(soil_ph) AS average_ph FROM soil_health_monitoring;
SELECT * FROM soil_health_monitoring ORDER BY plot_name DESC;
SELECT plot_id, plot_name FROM soil_health_monitoring WHERE soil_ph > 6.5;
SELECT plot_id, plot_name, nutrient_levels->>'nitrogen' AS nitrogen_level FROM soil_health_monitoring WHERE nutrient_levels->>'phosphorus' > 'low';
SELECT * FROM soil_health_monitoring WHERE plot_id IN (1, 2, 3) AND soil_ph BETWEEN 6.0 AND 7.5;
SELECT plot_name, jsonb_array_length(nutrient_levels) AS nutrient_count FROM soil_health_monitoring ORDER BY nutrient_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM SoilHealth WHERE ph_level > 7.0
SELECT plot_id, nutrient_level FROM AgroforestryPlots WHERE plot_size < 5.0
SELECT plot_id, tree_species FROM AgroforestryPlots ORDER BY plot_id DESC
SELECT * FROM SoilHealth WHERE ph_level BETWEEN 6.0 AND 7.5
SELECT plot_id, plot_size, tree_species FROM AgroforestryPlots
SELECT * FROM SoilHealth WHERE ph_level > 5.5 AND nutrient_level < 10 ORDER BY plot_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT plot_id, ph_level, nutrient_level FROM SoilHealth JOIN AgroforestryPlots ON SoilHealth.plot_id = AgroforestryPlots.plot_id WHERE tree_species = 'Fruit' ORDER BY ph_level ASC;
SELECT * FROM AgroforestryPlots WHERE plot_size > 50 ORDER BY plot_size DESC, plot_id ASC;
SELECT plot_id, AVG(ph_level) AS avg_ph_level FROM SoilHealth GROUP BY plot_id HAVING AVG(ph_level) > 6;
SELECT * FROM SoilHealth sh JOIN AgroforestryPlots ap ON sh.plot_id = ap.plot_id WHERE ph_level < 6.5 AND tree_species IN ('Oak', 'Maple') ORDER BY plot_id ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM SoilHealthMonitoring ORDER BY plot_id DESC;
SELECT plot_id, soil_temperature, pH_level FROM SoilHealthMonitoring WHERE soil_moisture > 50;
SELECT location, canopy_coverage FROM AgroforestryPlots WHERE tree_species = 'Oak';
SELECT plot_id, nitrogen, potassium FROM NutrientLevels WHERE phosphorus < 2.5;
SELECT * FROM SoilHealthMonitoring WHERE soil_temperature BETWEEN 20 AND 25;
SELECT plot_id, soil_temperature, pH_level FROM SoilHealthMonitoring WHERE plot_id BETWEEN 1 AND 10
SELECT plot_id, nitrogen, potassium FROM NutrientLevels WHERE phosphorus > 5 ORDER BY plot_id DESC
SELECT plot_id, location, canopy_coverage, tree_species FROM AgroforestryPlots WHERE location LIKE 'North%' AND tree_species = 'Oak'
SELECT * FROM SoilHealthMonitoring JOIN NutrientLevels USING(plot_id) WHERE nitrogen > 10 AND potassium < 5
SELECT plot_id, soil_temperature, soil_moisture, pH_level FROM SoilHealthMonitoring WHERE soil_temperature BETWEEN 20 AND 30 ORDER BY soil_moisture ASC
SELECT * FROM SoilHealthMonitor;
SELECT plot_id, pH_level FROM SoilHealthMonitor WHERE nutrient_level > 5;
SELECT plot_name, location FROM AgroforestryPlot WHERE area < 100;
SELECT log_id, timestamp, notes FROM MonitoringLog ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT nutrient_name, quantity FROM NutrientLevels WHERE quantity BETWEEN 10 AND 20;
SELECT * FROM SoilHealthMonitor WHERE pH_level > 6
SELECT plot_name, area FROM AgroforestryPlot
SELECT log_id, timestamp FROM MonitoringLog ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT plot_id, location FROM AgroforestryPlot WHERE area > 10
SELECT soil_id, nutrient_level FROM SoilHealthMonitor JOIN NutrientLevels ON SoilHealthMonitor.nutrient_level = NutrientLevels.quantity
SELECT * FROM soil_health;
SELECT plot_name, soil_type, nutrient_level FROM soil_health ORDER BY soil_type DESC;
SELECT plot_id, plot_name FROM soil_health WHERE nutrient_level > 3;
SELECT plot_id, soil_type FROM soil_health WHERE nutrient_level BETWEEN 2 AND 4 ORDER BY plot_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM temperature_data WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM soil_health WHERE nutrient_level > 3 ORDER BY plot_id DESC;
SELECT plot_name, soil_type FROM soil_health INNER JOIN plot_location ON soil_health.plot_id = plot_location.plot_id WHERE plot_location.latitude < 40;
SELECT plot_id, temperature, timestamp FROM temperature_data WHERE temperature > 30 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT plot_id, pH FROM pH_level WHERE pH > 6 AND timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT plot_id, nitrogen_level, phosphorus_level, potassium_level FROM nutrient_data WHERE phosphorus_level < 5 AND potassium_level > 10;
